md:
giải nghĩa từ "abdominal" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Abdominal (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Relating to the abdomen or belly.
	+ Vietnamese: Đới bụng, bụng.
	+ Example sentence: The abdominal muscles were strained from the heavy lifting.
	+ Related words: Abdomen, abdominal cavity, abdominal pain.

* Abdominal (noun)
	+ Meaning: A muscle in the abdominal wall.
	+ Vietnamese: Cơ bụng.
	+ Example sentence: The trainer focused on strengthening the abdominals during the workout.
	+ Related words: Abdominal muscle, abdominal exercise.

Note: The word "abdominal" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. In general, it refers to something related to the abdomen or belly.
